name: Ajuda

page1.title: ## <:e:{{help}}> How to Quote
page1.desc1: You can either mention the bot in a reply,
page1.desc2: Or right-click/long-press on the message and select "Make it a Quote".
page1.note: <:e:{{warning}}> **Note:** Only the right-click method works in DMs!

page2.title: ## <:e:{{cog}}> Quote Options
page2.desc1: You can change the font and various layout options using the buttons below the quote.
page2.desc2: You can view the list of available fonts by [clicking here]({{fonts}}).
page2.note: <:e:{{warning}}> **Note:** This will not work if you have enabled redirect settings for the bot!

page3.title: ## <:e:{{forward}}> Quote Redirection
page3.desc1: You can set up a "Quote Redirect" in the dashboard to aggregate everything that is quoted on your server into a single channel. To do so, go to the [bot settings]({{dashboard}}) and select the channel you want to redirect quotes to.

page4.title: ## <:e:{{user}}> User App
page4.desc1: You can install the User App to use Make it a Quote in DMs, [using this link]({{install}}).
page4.desc2: ### <:e:{{help}}> How to use the User App
page4.desc3: You can only use the Context Menu in DMs, so you need to right-click/long-press on the message you want to quote and select "Make it a Quote".

page5.title: ## <:e:{{sandbox}}> Custom Quotes
page5.desc1: You can use the `/custom_quote` command to create a quote image with someone else's profile.
page5.desc2: <:e:{{unflag}}> Customization isn't available for Custom Quotes.
page5.note: <:e:{{warning}}> **Note:** Both you and the user you are quoting as must have Custom Quotes enabled in the [bot settings!]({{dashboard}})

page6.title: ## <:e:{{web}}> Resources
page6.desc1: You can access the dashboard from the URL above. The dashboard allows customization of user and server settings.
page6.desc3: If you enjoy using this bot, please consider supporting us!
